Package io.vertigo.struts2.impl.views.freemarker

Class VFreemarkerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.struts2.views.freemarker.FreemarkerManager
      • io.vertigo.struts2.impl.views.freemarker.VFreemarkerManager
  • public final class VFreemarkerManager
extends org.apache.struts2.views.freemarker.FreemarkerManager
    Vertigo FreemarkerManager to override ftl loading order. 1/ look into webapp directory You can also override this behaviour with a context parameter in web.xml : The parameter's name is : TemplatePath The parameter is multivalued : Separator is ";" Possible prefixes : webapp:// : Add a TemplateLoader using the webapp loader specifying the prefix : empty means "/" class:// : Add a TemplateLoader using the classpath specifying the prefix : empty means "/" file:// : Add a loader using URL struts2:// : The default struts2 templateLoader Example : webapp://WEB-INF/classes/ 2/ look into /io/vertigo/struts2/ftl/ directory in classPath (ftl override in Vertigo jar) 3/ look into / directory in classPath (default to Struts2 jar) Use of this VFreeMarkerManager : add this to your struts.xml
